sect3.title: About Me
sect3.para: GNOME now has a new About Me control panel in which you can enter your personal details, such as your telephone numbers, address, email address, and instant-messenger IDs, instead of repeating the information in several applications. You can also change your password here.

sect3.title: Mouse Preferences
sect3.para: The Mouse Preferences control panel now allows you to change your cursor theme.

textobject.phrase: The Mouse Preferences control panel, showing cursor themes.
